segments.text: John , I'm sorry , the air tickets for the International Day are sold out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's possible because everyone wants to travel during the holiday weekend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I should have booked the tickets in advance .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Take it easy . I'll like you know if anyone decides to cancel his reservation .
segments.speaker: S1
